full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/26/2023 No. 38534716 Personal description of holder USCIS Registration No. A042 495 127 as of date of naturalization: I certify that the description given is true, and that the photograph affixxed Date of birth: AUGUST 25, 1915 hereto is a likeness of me. Sex: MALE (Complete and true signature of holder) Height: 5 feet 04 inches Be it known that, pursuant to an application filed with the Secretary of Homeland Security Marital status: WIDOWED Country of former nationality: at: HIALEAH, FL HAITI The Secretary having found that: ELEMOND SAINT LOUIS residing at: MIAMI GARDENS, FL having complied in all respects with all of the applicable provisions of the naturalization laws of the United States, being entitled to be admitted as a citizen of the United States, and having taken the oath of allegiance at a ceremony conducted by U.S. CITIZENSHIP AND IMMIGRATION SERVICES at: HIALEAH, FL on: SEPTEMBER 10, 2016 such person is admitted as a citizen of the United States of America. ALTERATION OR MISUSE OF THIS DOCUMENT IS A FEDERAL OFFENSE AND PUNISHABLE BY LAW for Ashriging U. S. Citizenship and Immigration Services OF HOMEAND SECURITYY FORM N-550 (REV. 10/12)
